legal_basis: subsection 139(1) of the Immigration and Refugee Protection Regulations
decision_reasoning: fears were based on generalized conflict rather than targeted persecution
conditions in Sierra Leone had improved, allowing for safe repatriation
application_details: Ms. Kamara fled Sierra Leone due to civil war and sought refugee status in Canada
conclusion_outcome: the judicial review application was dismissed
cause_of_action: Ms. Kamara applied for Canadian permanent residency as a refugee but was denied by the visa officer
procedure_followed: Judicial review in Federal Court assessed whether the visa officer erred in rejecting Ms. Kamara’s application
result_of_case: The court dismissed the application for judicial review, upholding the visa officer’s decision
